@@ -2002,0 +2002,7 @@
+                                                                            \
+  product(uint, SecondarySuperMissBackoff, 1000, EXPERIMENTAL,              \
+          "How many misses to accept before updating the secondary super "  \
+          "cache slot. This mitigates cache slot contention in "            \
+          "pathological cases. Use 0 to disable.")                          \
+          range(0, UINT32_MAX)                                              \
+                                                                            \

@@ -145,0 +145,3 @@
+  // Used to back off on secondary super cache updates to mitigate contention on it.
+  uint32_t       _backoff_secondary_super_miss;
+
@@ -743,0 +746,3 @@
+  // Backoff counters support
+  static ByteSize backoff_secondary_super_miss_offset() { return byte_offset_of(JavaThread, _backoff_secondary_super_miss); }
+
